snippet: Gambia’s government accused a former head of its presidential guard on Wednesday of leading an attempt last week to oust President Yahya Jammeh.
abstract: Gambian government accuses Lt Col Lamin Sanneh, former head of its presidential guard, of leading attempt to oust Pres Yahya Jammeh in December assault on presidential palace.
lead_paragraph: Gambia’s government accused a former head of its presidential guard on Wednesday of leading an attempt last week to oust President Yahya Jammeh.

headline.main: Gambia: Ex-Head of Guards Led Coup Attempt, Government Says
headline.print_headline: Gambia: Ex-Head of Guards Led Coup Attempt, Government Says

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
